alert.note: Alert for Comerio; Dorado; Toa Alta; Toa Baja (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 19 at 5:33AM ADT until September 19 at 8:30AM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM AST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall along Rio de la Plata and its tributaries, including Rio Guadiana, Rio Lajas, Rio Frio, and Rio Arroyata. * WHERE...Comerio, Dorado, Naranjito, Toa Alta and Toa Baja. * WHEN...Until 1000 AM AST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 431 AM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Flooding is already occurring or expected to begin shortly in the warned area. Between 7 and 20 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Naranjito, Toa Alta, Comerio, Toa Baja, Dorado, Pajaros, Galateo, Rio Lajas, Candelaria, San Jose, Candelaria Arenas, Campanilla, Ingenio, Palomas and Mucarabones. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Comerio; Dorado; Toa Alta; Toa Baja
